name: Exterminator: Escape!
description: Exterminator is back with a new spin-off title. Fight the mice in a new way, your style. Lights, camera, action! Get up on stage, load your weapon, and fire! They’re taking over the studio, so fight to take it back! See you on live on air!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1080 Storage: 1 GB available space
